settings.heading: Best Value
settings.sub_heading: Best Value is one of the leading brands of hardware and tools, it is among the fastest-growing brands on the continent and currently has a presence in more than 35 countries, covering more than 50,000 points of sale, with more than 3,000 SKUs in 20 categories. The Best Value brand has been widely recognized with proven success for more than 30 years.

settings.description: Caco America LLC is a trusted manufacturer of high-quality Personal Protective Equipment (PPE), serving industries such as healthcare, construction, and manufacturing. Backed by globally recognized certifications (ISO, FDA, CE), we ensure our products meet the highest safety and quality standards. With rigorous quality assurance and years of expertise, we provide reliable PPE solutions that protect lives and workplaces.

settings.heading: What Makes Best Value Unique?
settings.sub_heading: Our range of Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) is designed with varied materials that offer highest safety and comfort to the wearer. The materials also provide unique applications based on the nature of the work. They are also available in different sizes and colors to meet the requirements of the client.

settings.description: I’ve been using Caco American’s PPE products for over a year, and I’m thoroughly impressed with their quality and reliability. The protective gear, especially the gloves and coveralls, are durable and hold up exceptionally well, even in demanding environments.

As a healthcare professional, safety is my top priority, and these products provide unmatched protection. The masks are comfortable for extended wear and fit securely, while still allowing for easy breathing. I also appreciate that all their items come with certifications like ISO, FDA, and CE, giving me peace of mind that they meet global safety standards.

The attention to detail is evident in every product, from the materials used to the packaging. It’s clear that Caco American values both safety and user experience. I highly recommend their PPE to anyone looking for dependable, high-quality protective gear.

settings.heading:
What Our Partners
Say About Our Product
Healthcare
settings.description: The healthcare sector needs PPE like gloves, masks, face shields, and gowns to protect workers and patients from infections and hazards. These products are designed for durability, comfort, and sterility, meeting strict safety standards (e.g., ASTM, FDA). They ensure effective protection during prolonged use and are made from high-quality, breathable materials for optimal safety and comfort.

settings.heading: Construction
settings.description: In the construction sector, PPE such as hard hats, gloves, safety glasses, hearing protection, and steel-toed boots are essential for protecting workers from physical hazards, falls, and exposure to harmful materials. These products meet safety standards to prevent injuries from impacts, debris, noise, and chemicals, ensuring durability, comfort, and protection in demanding environments.

settings.heading: Manufacturing
settings.description: In the manufacturing sector, PPE like safety helmets, gloves, ear protection, goggles, and protective clothing is crucial to protect workers from machinery hazards, chemicals, and physical injuries. These products meet safety standards to safeguard against impact, vibration, heat, noise, and exposure to hazardous substances.

settings.heading: Chemical
settings.description: In the chemical sector, PPE such as chemical-resistant gloves, goggles, face shields, protective suits, and respirators are vital to protect workers from exposure to hazardous chemicals, fumes, and spills. These products are designed to prevent skin contact, eye injury, and inhalation of toxic substances, meeting strict safety standards.

settings.heading: Oil & Gas
settings.description: In the oil and gas sector, PPE such as flame-resistant clothing, hard hats, gloves, safety boots, eye protection, and respiratory gear are essential to protect workers from hazards like fires, explosions, falls, and exposure to toxic gases. These products are designed to withstand extreme conditions, including high heat, pressure, and exposure to hazardous materials, ensuring durability and safety.

settings.heading: Hospitality
settings.description: In the hospitality sector, PPE such as gloves, masks, aprons, and non-slip shoes are essential to ensure the safety and hygiene of both staff and guests. These products protect workers from exposure to foodborne pathogens, chemicals, and slips or falls. PPE in hospitality is designed for comfort and durability, meeting health and safety standards while allowing staff to perform tasks like food preparation, cleaning, and guest interaction efficiently.

settings.heading: Want to stay protected with GE PPE?
settings.sub_heading: Stay protected and stylish with the GE PPE—engineered for durability and comfort, perfect for any worksite.
